data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The two parties are usually bitter rivals. But ____ have ____ together ____ for a noble ____. This ____ event ____ money ____ three ____ in ____ capital ____. Tonight, everyone will hold back any debate or disagreement in the name of unity.
data.partBlankContent: The two parties are usually bitter rivals. But th__ have co__ together ton____ for a noble ca___. This ann___ event rai___ money f__ three char_____ in t__ capital ar__. Tonight, everyone will hold back any debate or disagreement in the name of unity.
data.answer: 这两个政党通常是死对头。但他们今晚聚集在一起是为了一项崇高的事业。这个一年一度的活动为首都军队的三个慈善机构筹款。今晚，大家将以团结的名义克制任何争论和分歧。
